title: In all seriousness, who actually enjoys playing against full AD comps?
body:
Yes this is a rant.

They are completely winnable due to lack of mixed damage, but holy shit are they the most boring an unfun games to play, even more so when you're a fighter or tank. 

You just accept that you're GOING to lose the early-mid game, build tons of armor and HP into the late game, even though they still manage to kill you less than 3 seconds in team fights. 

I get that there are a lot of champions in the game, and that there exists a lot of champions of all archetypes which can counter another archetype as a whole, but design of the stats which these champions utilize gives them natural counters which AP doesn't get, due to how the game scales. 

If a team is full AP, then by late game, they've stopped scaling and getting more defensive stats works to reduce their damage, where as AD will continue scaling to the point that even into the late game, you're struggling to keep up with their offensive scaling.

Edit: LOL at all the people talking about rammus and malph, you don't seem to understand what i'm saying. Yes, you can roll over these kinds of teams with the right champions, but the game itself is unfun unless your only concern is winning the game.
